name: Beginner Full Body
description: A beginner-friendly full body workout to build foundational strength and introduce proper movement patterns.
exercises: Push-ups (knee modified if needed) - 3 sets of 10 reps

name: HIIT Cardio Blast
description: High intensity interval training to get your heart rate up and burn calories efficiently in a short time.

name: Yoga Flow
description: Gentle yoga sequence to increase flexibility, reduce stress, and improve mind-body connection.
exercises: Seated Forward Fold - Hold for 1 minute

name: Upper Body Strength
description: Build muscle in arms, chest, and back with weights and resistance training for maximum strength gains.

name: Core Strength
description: Strengthen your abs, obliques, and lower back muscles for better posture and stability.
exercises: Bicycle Crunches - 3 sets of 20 each side
Dead Bug - 3 sets of 10 each side
Side Plank - 2 sets of 30 seconds each side

name: Leg Day Blast
description: Focused workout for quads, hamstrings, glutes, and calves to build lower body power and strength.
exercises: Bulgarian Split Squats - 3 sets of 10 each leg

name: Beginner Pilates
description: Introduction to Pilates focusing on core strength, posture improvement, and controlled movements.
exercises: Single Leg Circles - 5 each direction per leg

name: Endurance Run
description: Long steady state run to build aerobic endurance and cardiovascular fitness.

name: Stretch & Relax
description: Full body stretching routine to relax muscles, improve flexibility, and reduce tension.
exercises: Hamstring Stretch - Hold 1 minute each leg
Quad Stretch - Hold 1 minute each leg
Hip Flexor Stretch - 1 minute each side

name: CrossFit Circuit
description: High intensity circuit combining strength and cardio moves for functional fitness and conditioning.
exercises: Burpee Box Jump-overs - 3 sets of 10 reps

name: Swimming Laps
description: Lap swimming to improve cardiovascular fitness while being easy on joints with low-impact exercise.
exercises: Freestyle Laps - 20 laps at moderate pace

name: Meditation & Breathing
description: Relaxation and mindfulness through guided meditation and breathing exercises for stress relief.

name: Powerlifting Basics
description: Fundamental powerlifting exercises focusing on the big three lifts for maximum strength development.

name: Bodyweight HIIT
description: High intensity interval training using only bodyweight movements for a equipment-free cardio blast.
exercises: Push-up to T - 4 sets of 10 reps

name: Cycling Endurance
description: Long distance cycling to boost stamina, leg strength, and cardiovascular endurance.
exercises: Steady State Cycling - 35 minutes moderate pace
Post-ride stretching - Focus on legs and back

name: Dance Cardio Party
description: Fun, energetic dance workout that combines cardio with rhythm and movement for an enjoyable fitness experience.

name: Functional Movement
description: Workout focusing on movements that translate to daily activities and improve overall functional strength.
exercises: Turkish Get-ups - 3 sets of 5 each side
Medicine Ball Slams - 4 sets of 15 reps
Single Leg RDL - 3 sets of 10 each leg
